properties.body:
WESTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
SARDINIA.
DNC 08.
EIGHT METER S/V, WHITE HULL, ONE PERSON ON
BOARD, POSSIBLY DISABLED AND ADRIFT IN VICINITY
WEST OF SARDINIA (40-00.00N 007-00.00E). VESSELS
IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 3906 5908 4409,
390 6592 4145, FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
